data.lyric:
[ti:Sad Sometimes (feat. 黄霄云)]
[ar:Alan Walker/CORSAK]
[al:Sad Sometimes (feat. 黄霄云)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Sad Sometimes - Alan Walker (艾兰·沃克)/CORSAK胡梦周/黄霄雲
[00:00.44]Lyrics by：Rosanna Ener/Anders Frøen/Roland Spreckley/John Murray
[00:00.88]Composed by：Alan Walker/Corsak/Fredrik Borch Olsen/Rosanna Ener/Anders Frøen/Roland Spreckley/John Murray/Sander Meland
[00:01.32]Produced by：Alan Walker/Corsak/Mood Melodies
[00:01.76]Co-production：Big Fred/Sander Meland
[00:02.21]Performed by：Alan Walker/Corsak
[00:02.65]Vocals by：黄霄雲
[00:03.09]Backing vocals by：Rosanna Ener
[00:03.53]Vocal production by：Mood Melodies/Big Fred
[00:03.97]Programming by：Alan Walker/Corsak/Mood Melodies
[00:04.42]Instruments by：Tommy Kristiansen (guitar)
[00:04.86]Recorded at：MER Studios at Oslo, Tweak Tone Labs at Beijing
[00:05.30]Mixed by：Sören von Malmborg at Basecamp Studios, Stockholm
[00:05.74]Mastering by：Sören von Malmborg at Cosmos Mastering, Stockholm
[00:06.18]Label Courtesy：Alan Walker appears courtesy of MER Recordings / Sony Music Entertainment Sweden
[00:06.63]I've been dancing by myself tonight
[00:10.66]
[00:12.76]Close my eyes I'm fading with the lights
[00:18.57]Did you always keep me in the dark
[00:21.80]If you knew why did you let me stay
[00:24.83]Should'a never let you break my heart
[00:27.98]Now there is nothing left for me to say
[00:30.80]Cause I'm lost in the silence between you and me
[00:36.97]Now you're gone nothing's left of what used to be
[00:43.17]That's ok that's alright
[00:46.23]Go ahead and live your life
[00:49.41]That's ok that's alright
[00:52.41]But don't blame me if I get sad sometimes
[01:10.44]I still got a messed up point of view
[01:16.57]All I see in everything is you oh
[01:22.39]Did you always keep me in the dark
[01:25.71]If you knew why did you let me stay
[01:28.72]Should'a never let you break my heart
[01:31.84]Now there is nothing left for me to say
[01:34.72]Cause I'm lost in the silence between you and me
[01:40.81]Now you're gone nothing's left of what used to be
[01:47.07]That's ok that's alright
[01:50.11]Go ahead and live your life
[01:53.22]That's ok that's alright
[01:56.32]But don't blame me if I get sad sometimes
[02:33.89]But don't blame me if I get sad sometimes
[03:01.48]Sad sometimes
[03:13.76]Sad sometimes
data.trans:
[ti:Sad Sometimes (feat. 黄霄云)]
[ar:Alan Walker/CORSAK]
[al:Sad Sometimes (feat. 黄霄云)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权

[00:04.42]//
[00:04.86]//
[00:05.30]//
[00:05.74]//
[00:06.18]//
[00:06.63]今夜 我孤独起舞
[00:12.76]闭上眼 仿佛我与那光芒一起渐渐黯淡
[00:18.57]你是否永远让我蒙在鼓里
[00:21.80]如果你清楚我留在你身边的理由
[00:24.83]本不该让你伤透我的心
[00:27.98]此刻 我已无话可说
[00:30.80]因为我已迷失于我们之间的沉默之中
[00:36.97]此刻 你已离去 往昔回忆一无所剩
[00:43.17]没关系 不必担心
[00:46.23]继续你的人生
[00:49.41]没关系 不必担心
[00:52.41]偶尔的伤感 不必怪我
[01:10.44]我的世界依旧这样狼狈不堪
[01:16.57]我的眼中依然都是你的身影
[01:22.39]你是否永远会让我蒙在鼓里
[01:25.71]如果你清楚我留在你身边的理由
[01:28.72]本不该让你伤透我的心
[01:31.84]此刻 我已无话可说
[01:34.72]因为我已迷失于我们之间的沉默之中
[01:40.81]此刻 你已离去 曾经往昔一无所剩
[01:47.07]没关系 不必担心
[01:50.11]继续你的人生
[01:53.22]没关系 不必担心
[01:56.32]偶尔的伤感 不必怪我
[02:33.89]偶尔的伤感 不必怪我
[03:01.48]难过有时
[03:13.76]悲伤有时
